Fire pits can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should stoke the fires.
The Long Wait

'We wait for battle, and the wait is long. It seems longer still when the air is quiet and nothing moves! I must have patience, but I am not the only one who is restless. Look around you, and you will see many others grow weary of this endless waiting!\n\n'Let us brighten their spirits and take the stillness from their minds. How, you ask? Why, stoke the fires and share some stories. It will make the wait feel shorter.'

Talk to Habh没k

'For the first time in many days, I heard the low rumble of pleasant talk! There were tales of battles gone, happy memories of children, wives, and husbands waiting at home, loved ones all. Good memories were shared. Did you hear the same?\n\n'We have lasted this long, friend. One day this siege will end, but if it is not to be today, we will not let the passage of another restless day drive us to madness, and give the lie to those already spent. We will wait. One day we will win, and this waiting will be worth it.'
